pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Beauty Mushroom 75g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

An organic 5 mushroom health blend with plant derived vitamin C from Acerola to support collagen production for healthy, glowing skin.

Wanderlust Beauty Mushroom is a consciously created,
organic 5 mushroom, wholefood health blend with plant derived
Acerola vitamin C to promote beautiful glowing skin. Vitamin C is
an essential nutrient to support collagen formation and healthy
connective tissue important for skin health and provides antioxidant
support to protect against free radical damage.

Size: 75 g NET

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS: Wanderlust Organic Mushroom Blend* (97.8%) [Shiitake mushroom powder*, Enokitake mushroom powder*, Oyster mushroom powder*, Trumpet mushroom powder*, Brown rice powder*, Maitake mushroom powder*], Organic Acerola fruit juice powder* (2.2%).

*Organic ingredients

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, soy, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Directions

SERVING SUGGESTION: Mix 1.84 g (½ a heaped teaspoon) in 200 mL of water, hot beverage or juice. Alternatively, add to a smoothie or sprinkle onto
salad, soups or meals.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry
place away from direct heat
and sunlight. Do not use if
inner seal is missing or broken.
